title: Ballistic Missiles
description: These ballistic missiles, launchpads, and silos will allow you to create war environments.
longDescription:
A set of 4 ballistic missiles, 2 launchpads, and 4 different missile silos. You can use these ballistic missiles, launchpads, or missile silos to decorate your modern or historical war environments.

Important information

  • The missiles were created from photos (without being photorealistic) and from documentation for dimensions (without corresponding 100% to the real dimensions).
  • Launchpads and missile silos have been inspired by real ones but are not the official and historical launchpads/silos for these missiles.


Ballistic missiles:

V2

Used by: Germany

In service: 1944–1952

Minuteman-II

Used by: United States

In service: 1965

Shahab-3

Used by: Iran

In service: 2003–present

9K720 Iskander

Used by: Russia, Armenia

In service: 2006–present

Launchpads:

V2 launchpad: A Launchpad for the V2 missile with two Textures (one normal and one with burn effect).

9K720 Iskander launchpad: A launchpad with a Texture that allows the missile to be hidden inside.

Silos:

9K720 Iskander: 4 missile silos for the Iskander. 2 light (1 open and 1 closed) and 2 full (1 open an 1 closed) with the tube to hide the missile with each time two textures for the desert or the jungle.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 4 ballistic missiles with a Texture set.
  • 1 launchpad for the V2 missile with 2 Textures and 2 Animations (one for the idle state and another for opening the launchpad)
  • 1 launchpad for the Iskander missile with only 1 Texture
  • 4 different silos for the Iskander (light/full, open/closed). They are not animated but can open and close them by replacing one mesh/material with another. An example is provided in the level Blueprint.

Texture Sizes:

  • Ballistic missiles 1K
  • Launchpads 1K
  • Silos 1k

Scaled to Epic skeleton: No

Collision: Yes, automatically generated

Vertex Count: 572-4'530

Vertices Count: 544-7'977

LODs: 4 for all props/1 for the v2 launchpad (Skeletal Mesh)

Number of Meshes: 11

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 16

Number of Textures: 16

Important/Additional Notes: This pack does not contain Animations (or matinee) and particles for these ballistic missiles!
